law.history: Repealed 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 491, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 29. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 980.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Counties of less than 150,000 population constituting separate circuits -- Continuous session -- Where court held -- Where cases tried.
